# Logical function


```{r}
a1 <- c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)
a2 <- c(TRUE, FALSE, FALSE)
a1 & a2
a1 | a2
!a1

x <- c(-2,-3,2,3,1,0,0,1,2)
any(x > 1)
all(x <= 1)

which(x >= 1.5)
x[x>=1.5]

x <- 1 %in% c(1,2,3)
```
